name: EverGlitch
description:
In a world where the villain has taken control of the game itself, play as a young mage named Iris who must step up to take on the evil overlord Destructo. Travel through the magical forest of Thyme, solve puzzles in ancient ruins, defeat awakened monsters, and find hidden secrets.

EverGlitch is a game designed and developed by the Winter 2021 graduating class of Video Game Designers/Developers at the Toronto Film School. With a relatively small team of only 6 Developers and 5 artists the team was able to put together this level from start to finish in only 3 months with the assistance of our Professors and TAs, we hope you enjoy playing our game, any feedback would be greatly appreciated!
